name: Prepare Request
Link to the Lab instructions
info:
See corresponding Lab instructions in the link below :

- [Watson Tone Analyser Lab](https://github.com/watson-developer-cloud/node-red-labs/tree/master/basic_examples/tone_analyser)

name: Make sure you bind Tone Analyser Service to Node-RED App !
info:
When running in IBM Cloud, the credentials for the service will be filled-in from IBM Cloud credentials management.
For this to work, the Tone Analyser Service has to be bound to the Node-RED application.
